005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ICollectionValue;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.JsonFunctionException;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IStringItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IMapItem;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IMapKey;
021import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CollectionUtil;
022import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CustomCollectors;
023import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
024
025import java.util.Collection;
026import java.util.Collections;
027import java.util.HashMap;
028import java.util.List;
029import java.util.Map;
030import java.util.Random;
031import java.util.stream.Stream;
032
033import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
034import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
035
036public final class MapMerge {
037  private static final Random RANDOM = new Random();
038  private static final IMapKey DUPLICATES_OPTION = IStringItem.valueOf("duplicates").asMapKey();
039
040  @NonNull
041  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_ONE_ARG = IFunction.builder()
042      .name("merge")
043      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_MAP)
044      .deterministic()
045      .contextIndependent()
046      .focusIndependent()
047      .argument(IArgument.builder()
048          .name("maps")
049          .type(IMapItem.class)
050          .zeroOrMore()
051          .build())
052      .returnType(IMapItem.class)
053      .returnOne()
054      .functionHandler(MapMerge::executeOneArg)
055      .build();
056
057  @NonNull
058  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_TWO_ARG = IFunction.builder()
059      .name("merge")
060      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_MAP)
061      .deterministic()
062      .contextIndependent()
063      .focusIndependent()
064      .argument(IArgument.builder()
065          .name("maps")
066          .type(IMapItem.class)
067          .zeroOrMore()
068          .build())
069      .argument(IArgument.builder()
070          .name("options")
071          .type(IMapItem.class)
072          .one()
073          .build())
074      .returnType(IMapItem.class)
075      .returnOne()
076      .functionHandler(MapMerge::executeTwoArg)
077      .build();
078
079  private enum Duplicates {
080    REJECT("reject", (key, v1, v2) -> {
081      throw new JsonFunctionException(
082          JsonFunctionException.DUPLICATE_KEYS,
083          String.format("Duplicate key '%s' not allowed.", key.getKey().asString()));
084    }),
085
086    USE_FIRST("use-first", (key, v1, v2) -> v1),
087    USE_LAST("use-last", (key, v1, v2) -> v2),
088    USE_ANY("use-any", (key, v1, v2) -> RANDOM.nextBoolean() ? v1 : v2),
089    @SuppressWarnings("null")
090    COMBINE("combine", (key, v1, v2) -> {
091      return Stream.concat(
092          v1.asSequence().stream(),
093          v2.asSequence().stream()).collect(ISequence.toSequence());
094    });
095
096    private static final Map<String, Duplicates> BY_NAME;
097
098    @NonNull
099    private final String name;
100    @NonNull
101    private final CustomCollectors.DuplicateHandler<IMapKey, ICollectionValue> duplicateHander;
102
103    static {
104      @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap") Map<String, Duplicates> map = new HashMap<>();
105      for (Duplicates value : values()) {
106        map.put(value.getName(), value);
107      }
108      BY_NAME = Collections.unmodifiableMap(map);
109    }
110
111    @Nullable
112    public static Duplicates lookup(@NonNull String name) {
113      return BY_NAME.get(name);
114    }
115
116    Duplicates(@NonNull String name,
117        @NonNull CustomCollectors.DuplicateHandler<IMapKey, ICollectionValue> duplicateHander) {
118      this.name = name;
119      this.duplicateHander = duplicateHander;
120    }
121
122    public String getName() {
123      return name;
124    }
125
126    public CustomCollectors.DuplicateHandler<IMapKey, ICollectionValue> getDuplicateHander() {
127      return duplicateHander;
128    }
129  }
130
131  private MapMerge() {
132    // disable construction
133  }
134
135  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
136  @NonNull
137  private static ISequence<?> executeOneArg(@NonNull IFunction function,
138      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
139      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
140      IItem focus) {
141    ISequence<IMapItem<?>> maps = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0)));
142
143    return ISequence.of(merge(maps, CollectionUtil.emptyMap()));
144  }
145
146  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
147  @NonNull
148  private static ISequence<?> executeTwoArg(@NonNull IFunction function,
149      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
150      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
151      IItem focus) {
152    ISequence<IMapItem<?>> maps = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0)));
153    IMapItem<?> options = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(1).getFirstItem(true)));
154
155    return ISequence.of(merge(maps, options));
156  }
157
158  /**
159   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
160   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-map-merge">map:merge</a>.
161   *
162   * @param maps
163   *          a collection of maps to merge
164   * @param options
165   *          settings that affect the merge behavior
166   * @return a map containing the merged entries
167   */
168  @SuppressWarnings({ "null", "PMD.OnlyOneReturn" })
169  @NonNull
170  public static IMapItem<?> merge(@NonNull Collection<? extends Map<IMapKey, ? extends ICollectionValue>> maps,
171      @NonNull Map<IMapKey, ? extends ICollectionValue> options) {
172    if (maps.isEmpty()) {
173      return IMapItem.empty();
174    }
175
176    // handle the "duplicates" option
177    ICollectionValue duplicatesOption = options.get(DUPLICATES_OPTION);
178
179    Duplicates duplicates;
180    if (duplicatesOption == null) {
181      // default option
182      duplicates = Duplicates.USE_FIRST;
183    } else {
184      // resolve the provided option
185      IAnyAtomicItem atomicValue = FnData.fnData(duplicatesOption.asSequence()).getFirstItem(true);
186      if (atomicValue == null) {
187        throw new JsonFunctionException(
188            JsonFunctionException.INVALID_OPTION,
189            String.format("Missing '%s' option value.", DUPLICATES_OPTION.getKey().asString()));
190      }
191      String duplicatesValue = IStringItem.cast(atomicValue).asString();
192      duplicates = Duplicates.lookup(duplicatesValue);
193      if (duplicates == null) {
194        throw new JsonFunctionException(
195            JsonFunctionException.INVALID_OPTION,
196            String.format("Invalid '%s' option value '%s'.", DUPLICATES_OPTION.getKey().asString(), duplicatesValue));
197      }
198    }
199
200    // merge the maps
201    return IMapItem.ofCollection(maps.stream()
202        .flatMap(map -> map.entrySet().stream())
203        // collect the entries into a new map
204        .collect(CustomCollectors.toMap(Map.Entry::getKey, Map.Entry::getValue, duplicates.getDuplicateHander(),
205            HashMap::new)));
206  }
207}
